name: Luna: A Witch-em-up
overview: Entered into the the Halloween Competition 2019 organized by "Phaze101, Commodore Creators, Commodore 64 Malta User Club and Facebook groups, in special collaboration with Double Sided Games". You must guide Luna the witch through a never ending series of caves while avoiding and dispatching of enemies. As you progress Luna will fly faster and faster and the caves will get tighter and tighter. If you build up the power bar by killing enough spooky enemies you'll gain rapid fire for a short while. Destroy all enemies in a wave to receive a points bonus. How far can you get??!
